name: Home is where i'll be
description:
Home is where i'll be is a simple game/ It follows the story of a young soldier who was drafted for World War 2 for active duty. After the end of the war, the soldier comes home to his families old estate and finds several unposted letters that were addressed to him. The game is simple: walk around your families old estate and find and read these unposted letters to learn a bit more about the soldier, and what has happened during your time away. 

**DEVELOPERS NOTE**

HI! So im not really the best at creating sentimental games and sad games, in fact I would have never created one in the first place had my friend not suggested to. Just saying that I didnt design the notes or the contents inside the notes, my friend wrote them and suggested to code them into a game. So thats what I did. Also, this game isnt really a full game. I accepted my friends offer at creating the game because I realized that it would be a good learning experience. I began to mess around with UI, note collecting systems, etc. This game is more of a expiremental prototype to learn something opposed to a full on game. Anyways, I hope you enjoy this terrible game!
